definition: point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: When the pressure gets low the boiling-point becomes low.
sentences.chinese: 如果大氣壓力低，沸點就低。

sentences.english: But for primitive macromolecules to easily split apart for replication requires temperatures near boiling!
sentences.chinese: 但是對於原始大分子卻是在沸點附近容易複製。

sentences.english: Suff ice it to say that the unusually high boiling point of acet ic acid .
sentences.chinese: 只要談一下醋酸的不尋常的高沸點就行。

sentences.english: Today, television networks bidboiling point of the Madden people to unacceptable levels.
sentences.chinese: 今天沸點網絡電視爆料的勁爆到讓人不能接受的地步。

sentences.english: These experimental formulae can be used to predict the boiling points of the hydrocarbons.
sentences.chinese: 應用這些經驗公式可以預測不飽和鏈烴的沸點。

sentences.english: Separation of high-boiling components of corn polyols by reduced pressure distillation and molecular distillation were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 探討了減壓蒸餾和分子蒸餾分離高沸點組分。

sentences.english: Reaction temperature is determined by co-boiling point while using organic solvent.
sentences.chinese: 使用有機溶劑時，反應溫度與共沸點有關。

sentences.english: Resisting the balance backset current boiling point , the ones that reduce and brake oil volatilize effectively.
sentences.chinese: 搞平衡迴流沸點，有效減少剎車油的揮發。

sentences.english: Place the wool into a boil, then immediately reduce the heat to 82 degrees.
sentences.chinese: 將羊毛加熱至沸點，接着將溫度急降至82度。

sentences.english: So if A is the more volatile component, it has the lower boiling point.
sentences.chinese: 所以如果A的揮發性更高，它的沸點更低。

sentences.english: Petrol has a low boiling point; if a little is poured into the hand, it soon vaporizes .
sentences.chinese: 汽油的沸點很低，如果在手中倒一點很快就會揮發掉。

sentences.english: Petrol has a low boiling point; if a little is poured into the hand, it soon  vaporizes.
sentences.chinese: 汽油沸點低，如果倒入少許在手上，它立即就蒸發掉。

sentences.english: The boiling point of water is 100 degrees centigrade.
Ebullioscopy is obtained by classical chemical methods .
sentences.chinese: 沸點外高測定法是由經典的化學方法獲得的。

sentences.english: Then he interpolated and found out water boils at 212.
sentences.chinese: 然後他做了插值，發現水的沸點是212度。

sentences.english: Water's boiling point is dependant on its pressure.
sentences.chinese: 水的沸點是依其氣壓而定的。

definition: lit. to draw a gourd from the model (idiom)/fig. to copy sth mechanically without attempt at originality
